rules_text:
{W}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white Mercenary creature token.
{1}{B}, {T}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}, Pay 4 life: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
flavor_text: [i]While initial encounters were fraught, over time human and galaxian societies each accepted that the two had complementary skills and mutual interests. [/i]
